loginToGetAppointment: Log in to get your visa appointment sooner!
name: Name
orLoginBelow: Or login if you already have an account
quickStartDescription: Start using the app immediately. We'll create your account automatically.
pleaseWait: Please wait while we set up your account
almostDone: Almost done! Setting up your appointment search
targetDatesTooltip: Here you can configure your search start date.
noCitiesAvailable: No cities available for this country
invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
endDateMinimum: Target end date must be at least 210 days from today
passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters long
cityRequired: Please select at least one city
loadingConfig: Configuration is still loading. Please wait.
basicUserSearchDesc: Your appointment search will start 4 months from today.
premiumCanSearchTomorrow: can search for appointments starting from tomorrow with no end date restrictions.
targetEndDateExplanation: This is the latest date you would accept for an appointment.
targetStartDateExplanationView: This is the earliest date the system will search for available appointments.
aisCredentialsInfo: Enter your appointment system login credentials. We will automatically retrieve your schedule ID and number of applicants from the system.
step1Desc: Our system monitors 24/7 the availability of American visa appointments at the consulates and date ranges you select.
step2Desc: We send you continuous notifications so you know how your search is progressing.
step3Desc: When we find a date that matches your criteria, we automatically make the reservation so no one else can take it and notify you immediately.
step4Desc: You receive immediate notification when your appointment has been reserved.
moneyBackGuarantee: We cannot guarantee finding a date as it depends on embassy availability, but if you don't get results within one month, we'll refund your money.
securityBenefitText: Your data is encrypted and protected.
globalCoverageText: Support for embassies and consulates throughout Latin America.
availabilityDisclaimer: We cannot guarantee finding a date as it depends on embassy availability, but we commit to finding an appointment within a maximum of one month.
securityText: Your data is encrypted and protected. Latin America coverage available.
feature1Desc: We check visa appointment availability 24/7 so you don't have to
feature2Desc: Get notified immediately when an appointment becomes available
feature3Desc: Your data is encrypted and protected at all times
feature4Desc: Manage appointments for your entire family in one place
feature5Desc: Support for embassies and consulates in Latin America
clickEditToStartTomorrow: Click Edit to start searching from tomorrow.
adjustFilters: Try adjusting your filters or register a new applicant to get started.
clickToAddFirst: Click 'Register Applicant' to add your first applicant.
concurrentLimitMessage:
You have reached your concurrent applicants limit ({limit}).
To start a new applicant, please end one of your currently running applicants first.
searchStartedSuccess:
Search started!
Our system will monitor 24/7 and send you reports via email. You can log out safely.
appointmentSearchStartsSixMonths: Your appointment search will start 4 months from today.

searchPerformedAllCities: The search will be performed in all available cities for this country.
canSelectSpecificCities: can select specific cities for their search.
authenticationFailed: Authentication failed. Please check your credentials.
autoFillNote: Schedule ID and Number of Applicants fields will be auto-filled after authentication.
noUsersAvailable: No users available in the system.
deleteUserConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this user? This action cannot be undone.
updateApplicantInfo: Update the information for this applicant
fillDetailsToRegister: Fill in the details to register a new applicant
leaveEmptyToKeepPassword: Leave empty to keep current password
clickToVerifyCredentials: Click to verify your Visa Appointment System credentials and automatically retrieve your Schedule ID
autoFilledAfterAuth: This field is automatically filled after authenticating with Visa Appointment System
searchWillStartIn: Your appointment search will start 4 months from today.
premiumUsersCanSearchTomorrow: can search for appointments starting from tomorrow.
searchInAllCities: The search will be performed in all available cities for this country.

passwordRequiredForNewApplicants: Password is required for new applicants
viewManageAppointmentSearch: View and manage your appointment search
deleteApplicantConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this applicant?
stopSearchBeforeDeleting: Search is in progress. Do you want to stop the search before deleting?
searchStoppedApplicantDeleted: Search stopped. The applicant will now be deleted.
failedToDeleteApplicant: Failed to delete applicant. Please try again.

viewManageAppointment: View and manage your appointment search
accountUpgradedSuccessfully: Your account has been successfully upgraded.
menuUpdatedPremium: Your menu has been updated to reflect your new premium status!
cancelSubscriptionAnytime: You can cancel your subscription at any time.
accessAllPremiumFeatures: You have access to all premium features.
exchangeRateError: Could not get exchange rate. Price may vary.
searchCanStartTomorrow: Search can start as early as tomorrow
nextDaySearchDesc: Search for appointments starting tomorrow instead of waiting 4 months.
customNotificationsDesc: Choose when and how you get notified vs basic alerts every 2 hours
priorityQueueDesc: Your searches get priority over Basic users for faster results
moneyBackGuaranteeDesc: Not satisfied? Get a full refund within 30 days if you haven't made any appointment reservations with the application.
paymentSuccessUpgradeFailed: Payment was successful but failed to upgrade account. Please contact support.
paypalConfigNotAvailable: PayPal configuration not available. Please contact support.
whyFullMonthSubscriptionDesc: The visa appointment search can take a few hours, days, or even weeks depending on the availability of appointments published by the U.S. Embassy.
changePasswordDescription: Enter your current password and choose a new one
newPasswordSameAsCurrent: New password must be different from current password
errorChangingPassword: An error occurred while changing password

emailAlreadyVerified: Your email has already been verified
verificationExpired: The verification link has expired or is invalid
verificationExpiredDesc: Please request a new verification email to complete your registration.
verificationError: An error occurred during verification. Please try again later.
verificationRequiredDesc: Please verify your email address to access your account. A verification link has been sent to:
